name: Behind the Serendipity Engine
tagline: Technical notes, code, and build details
body:
The Serendipity Engine is a research project based in the Media and Communications Department at the LSE and supported by the Nominet Trust and Google, the primary investigator and report author is Dr Aleks Krotoski, and her notes can be read at [the main site here.](http://www.theserendipityengine.com) and on her [research blog here.](http://theserendipityengine.tumblr.com/)

The coder and technical architect for the project is me @benhammersley. This is where I will detail how it actually works.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
